structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Report Of Violations And Enforcement Actions To Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System And Registry
law.text: The commissioner shall report violations of this chapter, as well as enforcement actions and other relevant information, to the Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry subject to the provisions contained in section 13, in conformance with Pub. Law 110-289, section 1512.
